charinfo.name: Nii Yugito (S)
charinfo.description: A kunoichi from Kumogakure, Nii Yugito holds within her the two-tailed beast. She has full control over the bijuu Nibi, and is able to transform into it and use its powers to fight. Original Design: lder

abilities.name: Nibi Transformation
abilities.description: Yugito unlocks the power of her bijuu and takes on its form. She gains 50% damage reduction and can use both Spectral Fireball and Claw Swipe. This skill is permanent and cannot be used while in effect.

abilities.name: Spectral Fireball
abilities.description: By spitting a large fireball from her mouth, Yugito deals 30 damage to one enemy. That enemy will deal 10 less non-affliction damage for 1 turn. Each time this skill is used it will deal 5 more damage (this effect stacks).

abilities.name: Claw Swipe
abilities.description: Yugito takes a huge swipe of her claw dealing 15 damage to one enemy and 5 damage to all other enemies. This skill will deal 5 more damage each use (this effect stacks).

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description: This skill makes Yugito Nii invulnerable for 1 turn.
